<table width="98%" height="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" summary="layout table">
to study at university can be an exciting time. It can also
be daunting, finding out how to finance your studies and
knowing who to ask for advice.
This website aims to help by outlining what funding is available
for students at the College and providing information on managing
your money and budgeting before you start your course
Current students can visit 'Money Matters' for advice on budgeting, debt, benefits, financial difficulties, taxes and more . . . .
If you need any further information or
advice on student finance please contact Trinity and All
adviser (studentfinance@leedstrinity.ac.uk) who will be happy to help.
Please note that all information on student finance is correct at time of print. These pages are updated regularly with any changes or when further details are made available
